info.name: TorrentBD True Dark CSS - Github Theme
info.description:
Makes TorrentBD look darker and alters the accent color according to Github Dark Mode.
Author of the Source Dark theme for TorrentBD : @NaeemBolchhi
Note: This theme does not work well with the following scripts: 1. TorrentBD True Dark CSS by "NaeemBolchhi". 2. TorrentBD True Dark Js by "NaeemBolchhi".
For any queries feel free to contact me on TorrentBD: ac1d10.sk Gmail: webdevz.sk@gmail.com
info.additionalInfo:
1.01 - Initial Release
1.10 - Bugs fixes and added styles to more elements
